title: US Airways was a lousy corporate citizen
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
Don’t cry for Pittsburgh losing US Airways (“US Airways Gone But Not Forgotten,” Oct. 17). It was a lousy corporate citizen. Commandin...
